name: Loafing Kitty
description: A mechanical cat doll modeled after a certain famous black feline and equipped with a variety of interactive buttons.\nAs we all know, cats are rather mysterious creatures. With this principle in mind, the doll's designer devised a system that lets it respond to the user's actions â€” certain behaviors will delight the kitty, while others may cause it to shed its sedentary style and suddenly spring to its feet...
